Title: Maelstrom
Plot: Kara continues to have dreams about Leoben Conoy and the mandala she painted at her old apartment on Caprica. While on patrol in her Viper, she encounters a Cylon Heavy Raider.When Tyrol cannot verify Kara's claim that the Cylon ship struck the Viper, Admiral Adama and Lee become concerned about her mental stability.
GuestStars: Alessandro Juliani, Kandyse McClure, Bodie Olmos, Erika-Shaye Gair, Georgia Craig, Michael Trucco, Tahmoh Penikett, Dorothy Lyman, Callum Keith Rennie
